title: [House Brigatta, Sitting Room]
description: This room is bright and airy.  Varicolored crystals hang in front of the large windows and all the colors of the rainbow dance and flit about on every breeze.  A huge white bearskin rug from the far north stretches out before the polished stone fireplace and a straight-backed chair stands alongside it.  Beneath the windows, a long low couch reclines.

This airy room is softly illuminated by moonlight.  Varicolored crystals hang in front of the large windows and all the colors of the rainbow dance and flit about on every breeze.  A huge white bearskin rug from the far north stretches out before the polished stone fireplace and a straight-backed chair stands alongside it.  Beneath the windows, a long low couch reclines.
